hero.title: Dive into a world of adventures with friends
hero.text: AIAtlant is a gaming platform that allows you to create and play interactive adventures and simulators with friends, generated by AI.

heroCard.title: AI-Based Gaming Platform
heroCard.text: ‘AIAtlant’ is a group of enthusiasts who accidentally met in a bar and decided to realize their dream: making games and creating real adventures for themselves and their friends.

infoCard.text:
Currently, **we are in the prototype stage**, so all games are in text form in a Telegram bot!

We strive for the greatest possible variety of genres and are already working on implementing the first graphics!

testInvite.text: Participate in the closed testing of our new games!
